text: Futhi lapho phakathi bayokhalela (usizo) “Nkosi yethu sikhiphe sizokwenza izenzo ezinhle ezilungileyo hhayi lezo esasizenza” asizange yini sininike impilo ende ngokwanele ukuze noma ngabe ngubani owayengayaleka ayaleke na? Futhi wafika kunina umxwayisi, ngakho-ke yizwani abayizoni angeke babenaye umsizi
